Headline: Howard-bound Red Line Service Delayed at Garfield
ShortDescription: Howard-bound Red Line trains are standing at Garfield due to a mechanical problem on a train. Crews working to restore service.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Howard-bound Red Line trains are standing at Garfield due to a mechanical problem on a train. Crews working to restore service.

At this time, also consider other service alternatives that may serve your trip, such as nearby bus routes, or using buses to other rail lines.

Personnel are working to restore service. Allow extra travel time.
